title: Executive Order 12108-Employee Retirement Income Security Act Transfers
content: By the authority vested in me as President of the United States of America by Section 109 of Reorganization Plan No. 4 of 1978 (43 FR 47713), it is hereby ordered that the provisions of Reorganization Plan No. 4 of 1978 shall be effective on Sunday, December 31, 1978.

JIMMY CARTER
The White House,
December 28, 1978.
[Filed with the Office of the Federal Register, 2:26 p.m., December 29, 1978]
citation: Jimmy Carter, Executive Order 12108-Employee Retirement Income Security Act Transfers Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/244387
